title: Affordable 2 Bedroom Apt Home for Rent in AMAZING 55+ Community!
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today', '> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'The Legends at Silver Lake Village offers all the luxuries and conveniences you could want at a price you can afford.', 'Our 55+ community features a community room with indoor/outdoor fireplace, library, beauty salon, craft and card rooms, 24-hour fitness center, and movie theater room.', 'The apartment features its own whisper-quiet washer and dryer, and a private balcony or patio.', 'Reserve the guest suite for visiting friends and family!', 'On-site storage and underground parking are also available.', 'Our community is situated just blocks from St Anthony’s Silver Lake Village Shops (Cub Foods, Chipotle, Stone Cold Creamery, Walgreens, Coffee Shops and more) and steps from Salo Park, featuring weekly summer music in the park night!', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- 9-Foot Ceilings Throughout', '- Planned Resident Events!', '- 24-Hour Fitness Center', '- Large Bedrooms with Room For Your King-Sized Furnishings', '- Card & Crafts Room', '- Walk-In Bathroom Shower or Large Bathtub', 'We are a pet-friendly community.', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'The Legends at Silver Lake Village is a 55 or better senior community and participates in an affordable housing program.', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $49,320 | 2', 'Occupants: $56,340 | 3', 'Occupants: $63,360 | 4 Occupants: $70,380.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Call today to learn more about our community:', 'show contact info', 'Legends at Silver Lake Village', '2500 38th Avenue Northeast', 'St. Anthony, MN, 55421', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.']
